values:
Early morning sunrise
dewdrops shine on blades of grass
standing in my room
gazing in the looking glass

Stare at myself so ashamed
repulsed by the sight of my face
low self-esteem
depressing dreams
lost in the beat
of my defeat
insulting myself
I scream out for help

Whats wrong with me
why can't i see
what everyone else sees

He calls me beautiful
but i don't see it
he calls me beautiful
but i can't see it
he calls me beautiful
but all i see
is ugly.

I MOVED INTO THE BASEMENT! Tera showed up right after i got done moving all the really heavy stuff the little butthole, but she helped with everything else anyway which was cool of her, so when we were done i took her to Lickety Split as payment lol. hurray for Bannana Splits!

I'll post pictures soon,... maybe

i'm sick of this tiny ass bedroom of mine, anyone who has been here knows how small and hot it is in here,so i'm moving out.


of my room that is, tomorrow i'm not going to work (we're remodling there, go figure) so i can fix up the basement room (more remodling... GOD! i'm going to become a carpenter before i become a tattoo artist! HA!) so i can move down there. there really isn't much i can do alone without drywall some screws and a drill, so pretty much all i'll be doing is moveing all the junk out of the room, putting my stuff in, and getting the old sectional couch that we have to put in there and fold out the bed part and that will be my sleeping thing lol. i'll probablly end up going to wal*mart to get some lights and a big rug or something, which will do good until dad and i can hang all the drywall, which will be awesome, because i will get to PAINT! YES! i love painting.

so i hope that all goes well, and i don't get bit by a spider or something considering i be allergic. Ew. haha. But i love doing this kind of stuff so i'm pretty pumped. oh yes.

the cold embrace of death wraps about her body,
what an uncomfortable feeling.
I redesigned this from an original. she dosn't look like as much of a crack whore now. I might get to tattoo this on my dad tomorrow. I HOPE I HOPE I HOPE!
my dad gave me an art assignment, and i'm done, its pretty and probably my favorite assinment ever.

My creative writting assingment, get a blog and write in it. Hurray for me! i already have one with some history! sorry its been so long guys, but i'm at the studio killing some time, and since this is a homeschool assingment anyway, why not use it to vent some.

I'm fine, things are crazy though, working ten hour days and not getting paid kinda sucks, but its worth it in the end when this summer i'm a fully fuctional tattoo artist. Bring on the money to be put back for my own appartment in a few years. I'm excited. and i little nervous. i hope i get to tattoo my dad for the first time since i was 12 soon. Oh yeah, i gave my first tattoo at the age of 11 makeing me the youngest tattoo artist in america. and considering that said tattoo was better than most 40 year old tattoo artists can do, i'm proud of myself. and now that i've gone through some good art classes with Spence as my teacher, my guess is that now i will do a lot better. 

i miss you all so much, but this is what i needed. all the drama of school was litterally killing me. as odd as that might sound. i'm actually starting to sleep again. Lindz... i miss you a lot... and i will never forget fondling you in Science haha. that was a day i don't think i'll ever forget. i can see it now... "Grandkiddies! did i ever tell you about the time i felt up a hot black chick in science class my sophmore year?!" HAHAHA! I loves ya linds. Tell Hannah bannana that i love her too because i don't know if she really uses her LJ anymore.
<3
Nate! the Degrassi was awesome! stunning though.. oh wait we already discussed this... lol!

Later you all... 

VIC! i love your lamp!!!!

Britt

Daddy i love you
but i'm not such a little girl anymore
Daddy i need you
but your going to have to learn to let go
I'm growing up so fast
and the years we can't take back
My honesty pains me but i hope this confession is an awakening.

*chorus*

Your the world to me,
don't you know it
i see i'm growing away
and we both hate it
but what more can i say

*end*

I'm just a girl
but so much closer to a woman
i don't mean to hurt you daddy
but my love for you will never change
and as the days grow old
the seasons will change
and we will never fade away.

*chorus*

your the world to me
don't you know it
i see i'm growing away
and we both hate it
but what more can i say
when our words just fade away

*end*

Our old conversations of hours past
lost like the twinkle of youth in my eyes
what does it all mean daddy
where are we going?
know i'll always love you.

Daddy i love you
but i'm not such a little girl anymore
daddy i need you
but your going to have to learn to let go
i'm growing up so fast
and the years we can't take back
My honestly pains me but i hope this confession is an awakening.

Your the world to me
don't you know it
i see i'm growing away
and we both hate it
but what more can i say.
James was here, took my picture. hurray for bordom

So yesterday was x-mas. all in all not bad. One Supurb highlight of the day but i'm not permited to post that right now. lol. I got a bunch of Tinkerbell stuff due to the fact that my parents have called me "Tink" since the day i was born. why they didn't just NAME me tink i don't know, but here goes with the Tinkerbell stuff: Comforter, key chain, iron on patch, pillowcase, visor cd holder (for when i get my licence and mom's car..and get a cd play put in it..) little whiteboard thingy, and thats it. then i got a fairy notebook and book mark. and MONEY woot. oh and Tera got me boxers cookies and smelly good stuff. thats what we call things like that, which i'm sure lots of people do. 

Mmmmm Tea.

i'm bored and really have nothing to do until Zach calls and tells me we're going to town to blow all our x-mas money. Hurray! oh wait... i mean...err... hahaha. 

Now, what do you do about the father who refuses to face the fact that his little girl is growing up... its kind of troublesome... i'm 16 and i think he keeps forgeting that i'm not 10 anymore... both him and my mom think i'm stupid or somthing.. i swear they do. if they don't then...their quite good at makeing me feel like i am. Jeepers. all well.. i guess i'll go now, just thought i would update since i haven't in ages. since my birthday lol. wow.

Later. <3
Britt

Hurray. My dad got my the accustic Bass guitar i fell in love with a while back for my birthday today! this made me very happy, i shall take some photos and update with them sometime!

in other news.. THere is no school tomorrow. Hell Yes.

i miss Tera, she wasn't at school today. The turd is skipping. not really, but shh.. i can pretend.

<3

alright, due to request, heres my


Christmas Wish List 

1. Books, i'm a bibliophile books make me happy. i really like Stephen King and Anne Rice, and i would like to check out "American Phyco" or anything else by Bret Easton Ellis (hope i spelt that right lol)things like that. Horror books are loved and such.

2. a new Journal or Sketch pad, mine are starting to get full...

3. Derwent Graphite pencils and/or some nice pens... i'm a writer and an artist, i need the tools of the trade lol!

4. umm...its getting hard to think of things now.. anything to do with  fairies. (hint, they have a bunch of REALLY nice fairy shirts and stuff in Hot Topic.. i wear a Medium lol)

5.any of the HIM cd's. i don't have any and would really like them! or any of the White Stripes cd's besides Elephant.. i have that one lol oh or the Motion City Soundtrack cd.

6.a card.. 

7. Homade things.. even cookies will do! lol but that doesn't narrow it down to food.

8.chinese style things, mostly in black or white to go with my room.

9. jewlery.. nothing expensive... but silver is the best.or anyhthing the color of silver.. stainless steal for all i care.

thats all i can think of right now.. so there you go, hope you have some idea anyway...

I miss you

 

Dear Grandpa,

I love you so much, and i'm so sorry that i haven't seen you in such a long time. i miss all the times when i was a little kid and we used to watch loony toons together. Road Runner is still and always will be my favorite, thought it will never be the same without you there watching it with me. Without you Christmas will never be the same. when money was tight you always did what you could to make sure you got all of us something we'd always wanted. even the smallest things like hot wheels cars and building blocks could make any rainy day so much brighter with you around. 

for the past two days i have heard so many stories about you that even i never knew. you taught my dad how to shoot a gun and go hunting, that in turn he taught me.  There are so many things now that i wish i could have told you, and so many times that i wish i could be with you, but your gone now and theres nothing i can do to bring you back.

Your whole family loves you so much, and we're all thinking about you Grandpa. We're all very sad, and miss you, but we're all so happy that you went exactly how you wanted to, and at least now your happy. and just remember as you watch the tears roll down our cheeks, they are for your happyness, and thats all we really want. I love you Grandpa, may you rest in peace, and i await the day i get to rejoin you.

i don't want to die here. but i'm drowning in my own self loathing. "Don't Leave Me" I'll go for miles Till I find you You say you want to leave me But you can't choose I've gone thru pain Every day and night I feel my mind is going insane Something I can't fight Don't leave me Don't leave me A blank expression Covering your face I'm looking for directions For out of this place I start to wonder If you'll come back I feel the rain storming after thunder I can't hold back Don't leave me I'll go for miles Till I find you You say you want to leave me But you can't choose I've gone thru pain Every day and night I feel my mind is going insane Something I can't fight Don't leave me

whats wrong with me?
why can't i see
what causes pain?
why i'm insane
please hold me close
don't let me go
i don't wanna fall into space.

there is something wrong with a few people around me, and none of them will tell me whats going on.. that worries me.. a lot. i need to get away this weekend. i think i'm going to go set my tent up out in the woods somewhere or something. anyone really needs me, my cell phone will be on, or you could always drive out here and find me, it couldn't be to hard, you'd hear a radio from some hidden place in the middle of the woods... and see candle light and me either danceing, reading, or writeing. yeah. thats what it is. i don't know what i'm going to do, but i need to do something.

Lookie i'm and evil fairy. Yeah.. thats what i am.. it sucks. the first wings were SOO much better... but unfortunantly, the wiped off.. and i actually hate those. oh and btw, that outfit, i made it myself.

I used to be on the Regualr diploma track, then today, i switched up to Core 40... and guess what else i did. dropped English 10 CP and joined English 10 Honors. I'M SO EXCITED! you have no idea... its great stuff!!!


The Sesion premier of Degrassi is on tonight. HURRAY!!! NATHAN BERNARD! YOU BETTER BE ONLINE TO TALK TO ME ABOUT IT! I'LL BE WAITING ON YAHOO!!! woo i yelled. but it was an excited yell not an angry yell lol!

Love you all!
Britt
This Weekend may have some events! I'm so exited! haven't left the house in almost a year over night.. i hope this works!

I'M SICK!

sick of this house, sick of these four walls.. i need away... maybe i'll go dig up my tent and camp out tonight. god knows the stars will cure me.

So the stars are out so brightly tonight my dear, and we have so much work to do, Hold on to yourself and never let go, for you are all you really have my love. This world is all pretend, all small forms of fairy tales, no one can know what their fate holds. ignore the meaningless challenges and trivial arguments of life. they are all make believe, no one knows how much pain such simple words, or lack thereof, can cause, such mediocre things uttered under your breath, causeing loneyly heats to shatter, insanity seems to be leeking slowly from my brain to my heart causeing confusion and numbness to settle into the words i'm scibbleing on this page, that make no real since to me. its all false hope and words muttered quietly into the wind, the only one that knows all my secrets and sorrows trapped inside these four blue walls with pictures of friends an dposters promoting fame plastered blankly into random locations.its all insanity. i need to get out before i'm slowly driven to madnees. help. well at least i didn't have to watch a man or werewolf suck the meat off my fingers. isn't that just luck.

yeah.. thats it.

yes i was really crying, no i didn't fix my make-up that way. crazyness. i have no idea. don't ask. I was just bored.. haven't updated in a while. I GOT MY PERMIT! finally! and i'm driveing to school in the morning. I'm so excited! lol. i'm sorry but this is a big thing for me lol. Later everyone! Britt

Anger raidiates through my veins,
this pain i can no longer take,
the urge to stop this storm in its wake,
unatural urge to injure,
punch my fist through this wall,
destroy something before myself,
i think i'm going to exploade,
my head reels in pain,
i see the veins running throu my body,
i can't get away from here for anything,
i just want to be left alone,
but thats to much to ask these days,
isn't it?!

what does it mean if i keep a diary, and i look through it at random times, and i SERIOUSLY don't remeber writeing one of the entries. its not an old entry.. its only from a few days ago, but i honestly can't remember writeing it... it goes like this...


Dear Shmee,                          8/21/05
Theres something wrong with me, i don't know what it is, or how to explain it. I don't understand. I should be happy. I should be smileing, not wanting to curl up in the fetle position and cry my eyes out every wakeing moment of the day. Sure, everyone thinks i'm happy, everyone thinks i'm fine, but i'm not. I don't know what the hell my problem is. I have **** and he loves me, I have my Parents who both love me, i have friends who say they love and care about me, i don't know what the hell is wrong. i should be just fine.How many people wake up in the morning sad for some unknown reason? How many people look at themselves in the mirror everyone morning and have to fight back tears in their eyes? How many people look at their friends walking down the halls of school smileing and laughing and want to run away and hide. Shmee.... whats wrong with me?

Love ya Shmee...
Brittany Hall


Yes i named my diary. but still, thats a very strange entry to not remember writing.. i guess if i can write poems in my sleep i can write in my diary in my sleep, but jeez.thats the only thing i can think that came from because thats entry #2 for that day... kinda funky if you ask me.

Brittany

Dear Shmee,
good evening!

oh wait, wrong diary.. thats my normal one, all well hi you guys! how are you all. i'm... fine. a little bored and unsure of what to say, so i'm just saying hey.uh... yeah... bye i guess...

BUY ME MENTOS! i demand to be Minty! you deny me FRESHMAKER?! YOU! YEAH YOU! SHUT UP! aww baby baby i'm sorry i yelled at you, i loves you.

goodnight!
Britt

i'm a loser.

<s> all alone in the night, she's secretly crying...
she acts so happy in the light,
but when she hides in the night,
there's nothing she can do,
to stop her pain from showing through,
she holds her pillow tight,
and shuts out the world tonight,
as tears roll down her face,
she trys to leave without a trace,
this world dosn't need her,
she feels just like a blur,
sitting in the dark,
all she can do is think,
and with every blink,
more salty tears roll down her cheeks,
when all she can do,
is pull through,
all over again.</s>

the world is spinning, 
though i feel like i'm standing still,
everyone around me has their problems,
and theres nothing i can do,
i feel so helpless,
so worthless,
so unwanted,
but holding on with all that i have,
is all that i can do,
maybe one day,
i hope,
someone will need me again,
then i will have a meaning here,
right now i'm just going through the motions,
of everyday life,
not much difference from day to day,
i don't know what has happend,
to pull and push away,
but i will always hold on.
